website_summaries.verdict: While it doesn't offer much to distinguish itself from other Android tablets, the Galaxy Tab 4 Nook is a decent 7-inch tablet at an affordable price.
pros: The Galaxy Tab 4 Nook offers a thin and light 7-inch Android tablet with access to the full Google Play store and a bunch of Nook-centric freebies for just $179
The microSD card slot supports cards of up to 32GB, and it doubles as a TV remote thanks to a built-in IR blaster
cons: Except for Barnes & Noble's skinned interface, this is identical to Samsung's existing 7-inch Tab 4, right down to the average screen and camera resolution
If you're doing anything more than reading, you'll need to invest in that extra memory card
Faster tablets with higher-resolution displays don't cost much more, and will still run the Nook apps

customer_reviews.title: its FANTASTIC. It is a key component in my business ...
customer_reviews.text: While I've heard about others not liking this little tablet, for the price, its FANTASTIC. It is a key component in my business as well, small enough and powerful enough to provide light entertainment, from reading books to Candy Crush (great for passing the time on a plane). Its a Great little tablet. I plan on buying another one, one for business and another for fun.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: I actually like the older model better
customer_reviews.text: I had and still have an older model Nook tablet before Samsung started producing them, I actually like the older model better. This little Nook feels cheaply made. Performance is okay. Not the fastest when it comes to surfing the web. I like the added book functions it has, though. Auto adjusting back light for reading and programing to detect if you are looking at the screen are great additions.
customer_reviews.author: BusyMom

customer_reviews.title: great combo nook & Samsung  galazy  4 love it
customer_reviews.text: I love mine, I had thr nook & I have a rca 10" tablet, but husband bought me this for Birthday it has & does so much, its so much faster than the first nook, I love having the front & back cameras , it loads books & games really fast I was afraid I wasnt going to be happy because its only 7" inches & my nook & tablet are bigger but I am very happy you cant evrn notice the size change, absolutely love it & highly recommend it
customer_reviews.author: Bridgette R.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my husband, he was surprised and loves it, uses it every day.
customer_reviews.author: Adele Morris

customer_reviews.title: Pretty decent
customer_reviews.text: I was very pleased with how quickly this came and I knew it was a refurbished but the chargers they sent don't really charge and if it gets too low it doesn't charge properly but I am for the most part very happy
customer_reviews.author: Joanna Sorensen

customer_reviews.title: Great quality.
customer_reviews.text: Got it for my sister. Per usual after having it for an hour she starts complaining, because it doesn't have enough memory. It has 8G memory, you can add an SD card. Personally I think it is great and perfect for what she needs it for. She just needs to stop being ungrateful.
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra Ledbetter

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I am very glad I finally received it just what I ordered
customer_reviews.author: karen matthews

customer_reviews.title: Great for reading downloaded books
customer_reviews.text: Great for reading downloaded books, playing games and checking email, with a quick screen adjustment you can read in the sunshine (which was a huge selling point). Can be slow as a tablet, but for me that isn't the primary use of my nook.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob

customer_reviews.title: Love it -- my old Nook lost battery life easy ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it -- my old Nook lost battery life easy so I replaced it with this Samsung. It is great. Does everything I want it to do,
customer_reviews.author: Sande

customer_reviews.title: As described...and works great!
customer_reviews.text: Product was as described...works well and arrived in excellent condition.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Miller

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good item, was not happy about not being able to fill out applications on line, thanks
customer_reviews.author: Raymond F Aiello

customer_reviews.title: Screen crack after 15 minutes of use.
customer_reviews.text: I got this precise tablet because im altready have one, so we when for the second one, I put all the protections cushions like my fist one.. My firest table can be dropped and nothing will happen. This second one I saw a little blemish on the screen and the touch wasn't accurate as I touching one side of the screen and illuminated an other side. Well this tablet crack it's screen after 15 minutes of using it went it touch the carpet beside my bed. I'm wonder why? I'm not happy with the product.. Please let me know what to do. ???
customer_reviews.author: Dionicio

customer_reviews.title: IT WILL NOT ALLOW A NEW PROFILE USER TO USE THEIR NOOK ACCOUNT!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this Tab 4 NOOK because Samsung Galaxy said I could have other user profiles on it. BUT, IT WILL NOT ALLOW A NEW PROFILE USER TO USE THEIR NOOK ACCOUNT! I thought this was the answer to having to carry two NOOKS around with us. So I really do not understand why have more than one PROFILE if you CAN NOT have more than one NOOK ACCOUNT. I had know this, I would not have purchased the TAB 4.
customer_reviews.author: Frank L

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I gave it as a gift and still have not hear any complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Jorge A. Torres

customer_reviews.title: ... bought this to replace my Nook Color which I loved very much
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace my Nook Color which I loved very much, but I love this even more because it does so much more. I'm still leaning all the things it will do and what I can do with it.

customer_reviews.title: I love it.
customer_reviews.text: I love it.. Also like that you can also use other book app.. Unlike the old nook (color) I had..

customer_reviews.title: ... and she just loves it and the price was great and the size of this tablet is just right ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this nook for my wife and she just loves it and the price was great and the size of this tablet is just right for her.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this tablet! Works great, easy to use. I use it for recreation, reading, school, and business.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought two this year was so pleased,will be purchasing another.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: It was a bad experince for me
customer_reviews.text: This item was sold with no information on how to unlock the tablet. It was a bad experince for me. I hope the dealer improve on this matter.

customer_reviews.title: Great tablet for the money
customer_reviews.text: Great tablet for the money. Does everything I want it to do and it also works as a great remote for the tv and stereo.

customer_reviews.text: Awesome little tablet. It's a work horse. Has handled everything I throw at it.

customer_reviews.title: picture looks great too. Love it
customer_reviews.text: Everything works perfectly. Fast, light weight, picture looks great too. Love it !!

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Wifi and blue tooth fails after a few months of usage.

customer_reviews.title: Cant use sim card as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Hate it. It's slow and sluggish in functioning. Also, if you have A LOT of books like me, its VERY disappointing to discover that you cannot put the BN books on the extended memory. Anything that's marked as "propritary data"... like most big name apps, cannot use the extended memory.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Got this for christmas at a sale for $129, great value, very satisfied so far!
customer_reviews.author: Rafael de Abreu

product_meta.title: Samsung Galaxy Tab 4 Nook Edition 8GB Tablet WiFi (7-Inch, White) SM-T230NU
product_meta.description: With the Samsung Galaxy Tab 4 7.0 Tablet Juggle tasks at work and enjoy movies at home with a tablet that is portable enough for your commute and powerful enough to keep up with your busy schedule. The quad-core processor provides quick performance that your entire family will enjoy.
feature_bullets: This refurbished product is tested and certified to look and work like new. The refurbishing process includes functionality testing, basic cleaning, inspection, and repackaging. The product ships with all relevant accessories, and may arrive in a generic box

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars55 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
